content.rendered:
Blue Air is a Romanian airline headquartered in Bucharest, with its hub at Henri Coanda International Airport. Since 2016, it has become the largest Romanian airline by scheduled passengers flown.In 2017, Blue Air carried over 5 million passengers, a 40% increase over the 3.6 million passengers flown the previous year. As of February 2019, Blue Air flies to 57 scheduled destinations.

 

Queries handled by Blue Air Airlines Customer care:

Schedule, eBooking, Rescheduling, Track and Trace, Charter Service Queries, Trucking service Queries, e-claims Flight Information, Missing Luggage, Delayed Flights. Pharma, pets, valuable, perishable goods and extra care shipment queries. My Blue

List of Blue Air Airlines Offices :

Romania – Bacau, Blue Air – Bacau Centru

Romania – Bucharest, Blue Air Otopeni
Romania – Bvd. Magheru, Bucharest, Aero Network Consulting
Romania – Cluj-napoca, Blue Air – Cluj-napoca Airport
Romania – Iasi, Blue Air Iasi
Romania – Iasi, Blue Air Iasi Airport
Romania – Mall Vitan, Bucharest, Aero Network Consulting
Romania – Ploiesti, Aero Network Consulting

United Kingdom Of Great Britain & N. Ireland – London, Surrey

Is there any problem / complaint with reaching the Blue Air Airlines Address or Phone number? Please report any issues using the below comment form.
